name: Kryoling
printed_effect:
This Kryoling gets +1 {attack} for each {frost} in your
Underworld. When this Kryoling has 6 or
more {attack} during your Main Phase you
must either destroy it or Special Ascend
it to Kryovyrn from your hand or deck.
